President Trump’s message resonated throughout Michigan, speaking to the pocketbook and security concerns of hardworking families in our state. My #SOTU statement ⬇️ https://walberg.house.gov/media/press-releases/walberg-statement-president-trump-s-state-union-address-0 …
No right is as foundational as the right to life. It must be cherished and protected. #SOTU
It is time to come together to address our aging infrastructure. Rebuilding Michigan’s roads and bridges is vital to our economy and quality of life. #SOTU
For too long we have neglected to address the crisis at the border. It is imperative that we enhance border security and keep our country safe. #SOTU
January marked the 100th consecutive month of positive job growth. We must continue to advance pro-growth policies so all Americans have an opportunity to secure a good-paying job. #SOTU
The state of our economy is strong. Tax reform and regulatory relief have created an opportunity for more Americans to succeed. #SOTU
